gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render

Class TextRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.PointRenderer
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.TextRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowedTextRenderer

    public class TextRenderer
extends PointRenderer

    A class that renders a string at a point. Orientation and justification can be specified. Access the public member variables directly to set renderer specifications.

    TODO: test background colors with rotated labels
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
